p: All experiments were repeated three times and all quantitative results were analyzed to express as the mean ± standard deviation (SD). Data were subjected to one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) and the means were evaluated by Duncan’s multiple range tests or unpaired Student’s t-test to determine significant differences ( p < 0.05) using SPSS statistics 23 software (IBM Co., Chicago, IL, USA). All figures were plotted with the GraphPad Prism 7 (GraphPad Software Co., La Jolla, CA, USA).
